list_definition.definition: to say that something is a fact

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He claims to be the fastest runner in the class.
You can claim your money back if the goods are damaged.

list_definition.definition: to state that one is the owner of

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Did anyone claim the umbrella which was left behind?

list_definition.definition: a statement (that something is a fact)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Her claim that she was the millionaire’s daughter was disproved.

list_definition.mean_english: sự đòi hỏi một số tiền bồi thường
list_definition.definition: (a demand for) a payment of compensation etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She made a claim for damages against her employer.

list_definition.definition: a demand for something which (one says) one owns or has a right to

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He has a rightful claim to the money.
